subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Johan Santana, making his final start before the All-Star Game, gave up 13 hits and slunk off the field in the fifth inning of the Mets’ one-run loss to the Cubs on Friday.
snippet: Johan Santana, making his final start before the All-Star Game, gave up 13 hits and slunk off the field in the fifth inning of the Mets’ one-run loss to the Cubs on Friday.
